name: BETALD
slogan: BETALD invoice auctioning, comparable to eBay for invoices for companies
description:
BETALD is one of the leading invoice factoring finance specialist providing range of debt factoring, business finance, receivables financing, invoice factoring. Currently provides invoice finance solutions to the businesses in Europe.
(FRENNS is rebranded to BETALD)

team.name: Per Frennbro
team.bioHtml: Expertise in leading and growing business operations and revenue growth in leading roles as CEO, but is also well seasoned in project management.

jobs.title: Business development manager
jobs.description:
BETALD has a unique platform that automates all financing of invoices. For this we have 7 AI systems working in parallel in addition to the heavy financial analytical engine that all together can make decisions on its own. We were awarded the EU commission's seal of excellence in 2018 an excellent solution. This platform has given birth to several other solutions we are now rolling out to the market.

The Role, investment and lender recruitment OR SME recruitment

Working as a sales manager you will oversee the growth of lenders/SMES to join the platform and drive it fast forward. We are all enjoying what we do and we work the hours we need to foresee the success of the company’s growth.

You will have experience in sales to B2C or in the invoice financing sector already and have experienced success. We will allow you to shape the way we grow, and we will let you harvest the benefits from it too.

You have experience from the UK market are based in the UK - Please note: no foreign applications are of interest and no VISA sponsorships unfortunately.

We anticipate you have good connections in the industry to find customers to for example brokers, banks, accountants to build partnerships to get SMEs to signup to our platform. If you have worked for a broker it is beneficial.

The importance is not the number of academic degrees, but the results you previously have created.

We are currently in investment discussions so for a short while the role is commission based only. We will make you a shareholder through our option programme so you can grow with the company.

50% sales bonus of the sale you do.

http://www.betald.com

PS! We have three other platform you can sell for too so we are sure you can help us.

https://www.deepcheck.one

https://www.sofiqe.com
